dmca.title: AOBA/Cease and Desist Letter
dmca.body:
I am the Executive director of the Alpaca Owners and Breeders Association, Inc.  I am writing you regarding he web site www.alpacalist.com.  I understand from the site's WHOIS information that you are the registrant contact.

While the AOBA appreciates you interest in and support of alpacas and their owners, the show results you site contains are copywritten by AOBA and, there, AOBA has the exclusive right to reproduce, sell, and distribute them.  AOBA reqeusts that you immediately remove from you web site any copywritten material, including by not limited to the show results, and promptly provide me with confirmation that this have occurred via e-mail of United States mail.  AOBA must vigorously protect its intellectual property rights for the benefit of all AOBA members.  Thanks you for you anticipated prompt cooperation.

If you have any questions or wish to discuss this matter, please contact me.

(see image at: http://www.kswenson.com/alpaca/AOBA_Letter.gif)
